name: Pup and Paws
description:
Controls: WASD - Move, Right Click - Swap, Left Click - Attack, E - Interact, Shift - Sprint, Space - Jump.

Pup and Paws a micro game inspired by some friends pets.

Known bugs:

No logic for dying. (Refresh to retry)

Putting keys down there's a chance you can't pick them up again depending on terrain (Refresh to retry).

If you lose control of a pet swap back and fourth a few times to regain control.

APK for Android attached.
